room_title: Escape room "Treasure State" by Big Sky Breakout in Missoula
room_description:
In 1806 Lewis and Clark explored the vast beauty and mystery hidden in the mountains of Montana. To this day, people travel far and wide to experience our rich history and majestic scenery.  We discovered a 200 year old clue hidden inside our new downtown location! It appears that Lewis and Clark buried a secret that reveals the wonders of this rich Treasure State.

Now you can lead your own expedition through the wilds of this Montana themed escape room experience!
